name: MoneyMoon
description: MoneyMoon is a web based application that allows you to keep track of your financial debts and transactions. You can algo create groups of transactions to better understand how your money is organized in your account.

name: Marcfashion
description:
Marcfashion is an Ecuadorian tailor shop that jumped into the technology world.
With their new landing page they are finally able to expand their goals and improve their business.

name: Psy. Ismael Sarmiento
description:
A landing page and personal portfolio for Psy. Ismael Sarmiento, a psychologist based in Cuenca, Ecuador.
Ismael goal is to reach more people and be able to help them improve their mental health.
